General.Name: Lachish
General.Description: Lachish Industries Ltd. manufactures and sells cattle feeding machinery in Israel. It offers products, such as self-propellers, vertical trailers, stationery mixers, and delivery trucks. The company sells its products for dairy farming and feedlot industry under the RMH brand through distributor and dealers. Lachish Industries Ltd. was founded in 1956 and is based in Sderot, Israel.
